overview: STUDIO 2000 understands. You want sex! You want passion! You want brawn... and dick... and heat... and muscle! And you want the kind of super men you can't get anywhere but STUDIO 2000! You want Mark Slade! You want Clay Maverick and in STUDIO 2000's new psycho-sexual thriller, Twisted, you get it all--and you get it with a very pungent twist. Add to this such amazingly hot men as gym-giant Rick Hammersmith, boffo bottom Steve Harper, delicious Dean Temple and juicy newcomer Jack Ryan and you get spontaneous combustion. Top off this burning mountain of manfire with the incendiary Tommy Lord you have a blast furnace that's just too hot to be contained.
title: Twisted
